Fireball.description: A small fireball, not very powerful at low spells.

Minor Healing Spell.description: A basic healing spell that restores a small amount of health.

Minor Defensive Spell.description: A simple spell that provides a minor protective shield.

Minor Blinding Spell.description: A spell that temporarily blinds the target.

Minor Enhance Spell.description: A spell that slightly enhances a target's abilities.
Minor Enhance Spell.effect: Increases target's strength by 2 for 10 seconds
